txt.en: Igash the Fanatic bellows, 'Goblins! Gothgaash is slain. Take his tribute to Mazog. The Ghâsh-hai pay their due.'
'Killing you will earn me great favour with Igash.'
'My tribute will be returned and the Ghâsh-hai will earn great favour amongst the Gazathrug!'
'Come then, little things. Come to your slaughter!'
'Igash is slain. Flee into the darkness! Flee, Orcs! Flee for your lives!'
'Fire! Come forth and heal my wounds!'
'I call upon the burning flames to give me strength anew!'
'Wreath me in flames so I may be filled with strength once more!'
'I smell flesh...sweet flesh, not that of Orc-kind.'
Igash the Fanatic bellows, 'The Beast falls. Deliver its tribute to Mazog, the master of Moria.'
